name: Gangstar vs Cops
description:
'Gangstar vs Cops' is an arcade driving game.
I serve as a driver to help my colleagues escape.
After carrying a fellow at the contact point, the goal is to avoid the dynamic pursuit of the police safely take a colleague.
If you succeed in the mission, you will receive money and you can buy a new car with this money.
Picked up, dropped off and get rewarded!

feature
- Easy operation!
- chase shooting action
- Buying a new car
- Various weapons
- Hip-hop soundtrack
- Rank
- Achievements
- thrill
- speed
